RestaurantItem

name: source/components/restaurant/RestaurantListScreen.js
RestaurantListScreen
description:
RestaurantListScreen displays an infinite list of restaurants,
based on scroll position, loading animation in the absense of data,
and loaction search functionality

name: constructor
description: Gets the list of restaurants on load

name: renderItems
description: Renders individual restaurant tiles

name: source/components/restaurant/RestaurantScreen.js
RestaurantScreen
description:
Single restaurant view,
handles map view (loacation and direction),
link to tel, and website.

name: source/stores/AppStore.js
AppStore
description:
MobX store class.
This creates the base store for the app.
It containes configuration for all stores and app wide preferences.

name: name
description: Dummy Varaible

description:
Function used to assign values to the members of
 this class from an external function or a react component.

params.name: arr
params.description: An array key:value pairs of class members and their values

params.name: self
params.description: Refers to the class itself or a member which is a member.

name: source/stores/RestaurantStore.js
RestaurantStore
description:
MobX store class.
For restaurant component and related actions.

name: searchbarRef
description: This holds a reference to the searchbar component.

name: loading
description: This controls the display of the loading animation in the restaurant list component.

name: refreshing
description: This controls the refreshing indicator on pull down in the restaurant list component

name: restaurants
description: This is an array of objects containing individual restaurant data.

name: showSearchbar
description: This switch shows and hides the searchbar.

name: searchString
description: This holds the location search query string.

name: setClassProps
description:
Function used to assign values to the members of
this class from an external function or a react component.

params.name: arr
params.description: An array key:value pairs of class members and their values

params.name: self
params.description: Refers to the class itself or a member which is a member.

name: getRestaurants
description:
Function used to both get the array of restaurants on initial load,
refresh the list on pull to refresh,
and get new restaurants based on search query.

params.name: load
params.description: load type, either load or refresh.

params.name: location
params.description: location parameter.

name: onEndReached
description:
Function used during infinite scrolling.
It's triggered when the scroll has reached the specified threshold.

content:
{
  "main": "node_modules/expo/AppEntry.js",
  "watch": {
    "docs": "{src/assets,components/common}/**/*.*"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "watch": "npm-watch docs",
    "start": "npm-run-all --parallel watch lint-test start-dev",
    "android": "npm-run-all --parallel watch lint-test android-dev",
    "ios": "npm-run-all --parallel watch lint-test ios-dev",
    "start-dev": "node ./node_modules/.bin/expo start",
    "android-dev": "node ./node_modules/.bin/expo start --android",
    "ios-dev": "node ./node_modules/.bin/expo start --ios",
    "test": "node ./node_modules/.bin/jest --watchAll",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "lint": "node_modules/.bin/esw",
    "lint-watch": "node_modules/.bin/esw --watch",
    "lint-test": "npm-run-all --parallel lint-watch test",
    "publish": "node ./node_modules/.bin/expo publish",
    "eject": "node ./node_modules/.bin/expo eject"
  },
  "jest": {
    "preset": "jest-expo",
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "coverageReporters": [
      "json",
      "html"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "**/tests/**/*.js"
    ],
    "transform": {
      "\\.js$": "./node_modules/react-native/jest/preprocessor.js"
    },
    "snapshotSerializers": [
      "./node_modules/enzyme-to-json/serializer"
    ],
    "setupTestFrameworkScriptFile": "./node_modules/jest-enzyme/lib/index.js",
    "setupFiles": [
      "enzyme-react-16-adapter-setup",
      "react-native/Libraries/Animated/src/bezier"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@expo/vector-icons": "^10.0.1",
    "axios": "^0.18.0",
    "expo": "^32.0.0",
    "mobx": "^5.9.4",
    "mobx-react": "^5.4.3",
    "react": "16.5.0",
    "react-native": "https://github.com/expo/react-native/archive/sdk-32.0.0.tar.gz",
    "react-native-material-textfield": "^0.12.0",
    "react-native-svg-animated-linear-gradient": "^0.1.9",
    "react-navigation": "^3.6.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/react": "^16.8.13",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.1",
    "babel-preset-expo": "^5.0.0",
    "enzyme": "^3.9.0",
    "enzyme-adapter-react-16": "^1.12.1",
    "enzyme-react-16-adapter-setup": "^0.1.0",
    "enzyme-to-json": "^3.3.5",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.16.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^17.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.16.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.12.4",
    "eslint-watch": "^5.0.1",
    "jest-enzyme": "^7.0.2",
    "jest-expo": "^32.0.0",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "npm-watch": "^0.6.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.8.6",
    "react-test-renderer": "^16.8.6"
  },
  "private": true
}
